home_presentation_paragraph: Fullstack Web Apps Developer, I love technology and I can say that coding is my thing.
home_about_hero_paragraph:
I started programming in a self-taught way to create my own projects, then I started as a freelancer programmer where I worked with several teams and startups to get a digital product with the best standards.

I am a self-confident person, curious by nature and I am always working to improve my skills.

skills.title: Frontend
skills.description: I specialized in developing Web Apps with Vue and NuxtJS; the power of these tools is incredible.

skills.title: Backend
skills.description: The structuring of a database and its communication with the frontend is the key to any Web App or website.

skills.title: Teacher
skills.description: I teach programming classes in my local community, my goal is to help other developers to keep improving.

works.title: Focomotor
works.overview: A vehicle marketplace with the objective of connecting sellers with buyers, any user can publish their vehicle for free and without commissions, you only have to register, complete the data and upload some photos of the vehicle, it's that easy!
works.development: This project was built with a REST Api in Laravel which is consulted by its client developed in NuxtJs; this makes the site 100% crawlable for search engines but with all the advantages of a Web App.

works.title: Kresta Automotores
works.overview: Web App for the management of a vehicle dealership: loading and administration of partners, cash registers and vehicles. The objective of the application is to organize the finances and calculate the profit for each partner when a vehicle is sold, allowing to print and send the settlement to each partner.
works.development: It is an application designed to work client-side, so I used Vue to send and receive data from Firebase, who provides the database and image server, so the administrator can access the system from any device with your username and password.

works.title: PazMuseu
works.overview: This project was presented as a solution to the problem posed in the 2022 Olympics of computer science in education in Argentina, the objective was to create a virtual museum, which can be accessed through a BeepCons. The objective was to create a virtual museum, which can be accessed through a BeepCons. The virtual museum has a system of exhibitions, routes, guides, shifts and registrations.
works.development: The application was built entirely with Laravel within a week, it has 5 complete cruds (exhibitions, routes, guides, shifts and registrations), additionally it has a system for sending emails to confirm registrations to shifts. The system has a built-in administration panel. Below you can see the DER graphic that was used:

works.title: Calculadora Braille
works.overview: This is a simple and intuitive calculator web application, intended to be used by blind and visually impaired people. For this reason the calculator is designed with bright colors and high contrasts, each key pressed and the result of the calculations is narrated by a computer voice. The project was presented at the "Fairs of Education, Arts, Science and Technology" in OlavarrÃ­a, Buenos Aires, Argentina in 2021 obtaining the following certification:
works.development: The application was built with Vue, a lot of care was taken in the interface, being remodeled several times. For the numbers to be narrated we used the npm library "written-number", this allowed us to read the numbers completely and not dictated one by one.

works.title: Escuela TÃ©cnica NÂ°2
works.overview: As a student of Computer Science at the "Escuela TÃ©cnica NÂ°2" of OlavarrÃ­a, Buenos Aires, Argentina, in my course we evaluated that the school needed a digital communication channel that would allow future students to know the school and find timely information, that is why we developed a site from which news, information of the technical courses and digital books can be published.
works.development: My job was to take the ideas and schematics to a finished website, for this I used Vue and Firebase as database and image server. The site can be administered from a complete management dashboard.

works.title: El bosque inmobiliaria
works.overview: Website of online courses with university certification. There are more than 20 courses organized in 9 categories. Information can be found easily and has several communication channels so that any interested student can get more information.
works.development: This website was developed with Wordpress, as it allows a fast development and administration. I used the well-known visual editor Elementor, even though sometimes I had to program sections with HTML and Javascript so that the result is completely adapted to the client's wishes.

works.title: CapacitaciÃ³n Argentina
works.overview: Website for the real estate agency "El bosque" located in RÃ­o Turbio, Santa Cruz, Argentina with the objective of publishing and promoting properties. From the page you can see in detail each property; gallery, square meters, rooms, description, services, among others
works.development: The website was developed with Wordpress and Elementor, the JetEngine plugin was essential, from which a new type of post, custom fields, administration forms and search filters were implemented.

contact_success: Thank you, your message was received. I will be contacting you shortly.
contact_form_description: I am interested in freelancer opportunities, especially large projects. But, if you have any other request or question, don't hesitate to contact me.
